thread.title: Eva-Merete
thread.title_full: Nevada Corporate Headquarters, Inc. reviewed by Eva-Merete

author: Eva-Merete
title: Eva-Merete
text: Security and privacy is important to our family. We own multiple rental units and decided to take steps to protect our family and investments. The NCH team of professionals walked us through incorporations, land trusts, foreign filings, land trusts, wills and Revocable Living Trusts. Doug Drowley and his legal team went above and beyond in walking us through the Revocable Trusts and associated documents. Spending several hours on the phone, Doug was a consumate professional and answered every question and concern about the process and the documents. In the end, the team at NCH saved us time and money and we now feel secure going forward with our current and future investments.
